body_html: I've had the same problem in 1.5.0 with a VQA model (CNN for image inputs, LSTM for text inputs, and merging both, then classifying) and found out the problem happens at the merging layer (tried using concatenate and multiply). RAM goes up -> swap goes up -> machine hangs. Trying to run the sub-models before merging works fine. Works fine on 1.4.1, but I haven't tried using master yet.
